Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Here's what you need to know on what netizens are saying online: members of the Women's Economic Equality Taskforce and other Australians concerned with financial inequality and social welfare are calling for increased government action claiming that the proposed tax cuts are costly and could be better spent elsewhere. Additionally there are questions about whether the news reported by certain media sources is reliable and whether the government should be taking advice from international financial institutions. On the other side of things there are some more celebratory posts from netizens online showing appreciation for those working to address these concerns.
